original_text: That lie upon beds of ivory, and stretch themselves upon their couches, and eat the lambs out of the flock, and the calves out of the midst of the stall;
korean_text: 상아 상에 누우며 침상에서 기지개 켜며 양 떼에서 어린 양과 우리에서 송아지를 잡아서 먹고

sentences.original_text: That lie upon beds of ivory
and stretch themselves upon their couches
and eat the lambs out of the flock
sentences.korean_translation: 양 무리에서 어린 양을 먹는 자들

sentences.original_text: and the calves out of the midst of the stall
